content: What the hell? There seems to be a rash of these slayings. Did this happen during the last depression? quote: (CNN) -- Five children were found shot to death in a home near Tacoma, Washington, Saturday afternoon, police said. Pierce County sheriff's spokesman Ed Troyer told CNN that the children, ages 7 to 16, were killed by their father, who apparently committed suicide later in nearby King County. "http://www.cnn.com/2009/CRIME/04/04/washington.children.shot/index.html?eref=rss_topstories"

title: 5 children found slain in Washington state

content: This stuff has been going on for years, but it has gotten allot worse in the past 10 or so it seems. It's aweful, how in the hell can someone be so (I don't even know hopw to describe it) to kill any child let alone thier own. What are they thinking? I can't make it so they shouldn't able to either? Jesus Christ, people need to get a grip. If this even crosses someones thoughts, they need to go see someone or just go run away alone and out yourself, leave everyone else alone. These poor babies.

content: quote: Originally posted by AliBubba: If he'd had to beat their brains out, one or two of them might have escaped from that trailer. BS comment. An ax, shovel, etc. would have been almost as quick, especailly if he did the biggest first.
quote: Originally posted by AliBubba: If he'd had to beat their brains out, one or two of them might have escaped from that trailer.

content: quote: Did this happen during the last depression? Don't know ... but it doesn't appear that this one has anything to do with the recession ... quote: GRAHAM, Wash. — A man who fatally shot his five children and killed himself had just discovered his wife was leaving him for another man, authorities said Sunday. . . The night before, the father and his eldest daughter went in search of his wife, Angela Harrison. The daughter used a GPS feature in her mother's cell phone to find her with another man at a convenience store in nearby Auburn, said Ed Troyer, spokesman for the Pierce County Sheriff. The woman told her husband she was not coming home, and was leaving him for the man with her at the store. The father and the daughter left, distraught, Troyer said. <more> "http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,512581,00.html"
quote: Did this happen during the last depression?

content: there are no words that can describe how a parent, or anyone for that matter, can harm or kill a child. It is said that the man recently learned that his wife was thinking of leaving him and then he did this thing. We should all pray that God comforts these children... I know I should ask the same for the father but I just cannot... I ask myself, "what would Jesus do?" And I know His kind heart has unlimited forgiveness but then I come full circle and am at a loss of words how someone could harm a child..... so sad. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
